channel.title: Forever project
channel.description:
Ill update this post as i complete.
4% complete |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
[b][u] What ive done:[/u][/b] Zippo? I added runescape's autospawn... Fixed sprites Cleaned client.java
[b]Goals by the end of the day:[/b] Mage and required runes. Range + arrows Fix cache
[b]To do list:[/b] Fix drops Fix cache Fix fucked up slayer Fix magic Make range work Add runes to mage Fix doubled autospawn (Every single spawn comes up twice... Took rs's autospawn.. guess i deserve it for short cuts eh?) Create quests Fix pots Delete usless crap Fix shops Add better shops Add bank drop box Add half the skills Fix clients cache (Ags spec chickens... wont do) Fix the fucked up sprites on this client Get new client... Working pray/hp/run buttons on minimap More when i find out what else is needed but those are needed... badly
Type of server: Basicaly a re-vamped slightly higher xp rate Runescape on a 317. I decided to make this because im tired of all these insta-own spec items. Im also not going to charge for membership... because i beleive that paying for a game is just stupid. Donations will be accepted. =)
source: I think it was originaly delta... can be traced all the way to pimpscape... mabey wildisle? By now so many sources are leached... idfk
I call it Forever project because the name will be "Forever scape" and it seems like this is going to take for ever =)

item.title: Forever project
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

He doesn’t have to update it every single time he completes something you know. And yes, if you copy and paste something such as even PvP combat, it’s still progress to your server development, the same with items.cfg and autospawn.cfg and all those other files.

Read full topic

item.title: Forever project
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:6, topic:311356”][quote author=jeddac link=topic=407799.msg3011545#msg3011545 date=1256821263]
You mean progress - 0%, learning to copy and paste >.>
[/quote]Even if it’s copy and paste, it’s still progress to the server.[/quote]

Not entirely, npc autospawn’s are peoples least-developed things due to the fact there are so many tool lists around with them. I realize this was posted today (My time), though he could of done a large amount of things in one day, even shown a picture of what he’s done whilst working on it today.

Read full topic

item.title: Forever project
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

jeddac:

You mean progress - 0%, learning to copy and paste >.>

Don’t be so hard on these people, after all… He/she’s giving it a go.

@Author: Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Forever project
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Please post more information about your intentions and what form of server this will be;

Example: server base- Czar, wL, Emulous, Delta. Type of server- Pking server, my intentions are to make a great base for Old-school pking.

Read full topic

item.title: Forever project
item.dc:creator: @str_rockstar str rockstar
item.description:
@str_rockstar wrote:

Ill update this post as i complete.

4% complete
|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||


What ive done:
Zippo? I added runescape’s autospawn…
Fixed sprites
Cleaned client.java

Goals by the end of the day:
Mage and required runes.
Range + arrows
Fix cache

To do list:
Fix drops
Fix cache
Fix fucked up slayer
Fix magic
Make range work
Add runes to mage
Fix doubled autospawn (Every single spawn comes up twice… Took rs’s autospawn… guess i deserve it for short cuts eh?)
Create quests
Fix pots
Delete usless crap
Fix shops
Add better shops
Add bank drop box
Add half the skills
Fix clients cache (Ags spec chickens… wont do)
Fix the fucked up sprites on this client
Get new client…
Working pray/hp/run buttons on minimap
More when i find out what else is needed but those are needed… badly

Type of server:
Basicaly a re-vamped slightly higher xp rate Runescape on a 317. I decided to make this because im tired of all these insta-own spec items. Im also not going to charge for membership… because i beleive that paying for a game is just stupid. Donations will be accepted. =)

source: I think it was originaly delta… can be traced all the way to pimpscape… mabey wildisle? By now so many sources are leached… idfk

I call it Forever project because the name will be “Forever scape” and it seems like this is going to take for ever =)
